RingBearers.Name: Sauron
RingBearers.Description: Original creator of the One Ring, which he used to dominate Middle-earth.

RingBearers.Name: Deagol
RingBearers.Description: Found the One Ring at the bottom of a river and briefly became a ring bearer before being killed by Smeagol for the Ring.

RingBearers.Name: Smeagol/Gollum
RingBearers.Description: Took the One Ring from Deagol and became its bearer for hundreds of years, leading to his transformation into a wretched creature.

RingBearers.Name: Bilbo Baggins
RingBearers.Description: Found the One Ring in Gollum's cave during 'The Hobbit' and carried it for many years before passing it on to Frodo.

RingBearers.Name: Frodo Baggins
RingBearers.Description: Chosen as the Ring bearer and tasked with the mission to destroy the One Ring in the fires of Mount Doom.

RingBearers.Name: Tom Bombadil
RingBearers.Description: A mysterious and powerful figure in the Old Forest who briefly held the One Ring but was unaffected by its corrupting influence.

RingBearers.Name: Samwise Gamgee
RingBearers.Description: Carried the Ring for a brief period when he believed Frodo to be dead, his loyalty and determination were crucial to the mission's success.

RingBearers.Name: Isildur
RingBearers.Description: Cut the One Ring from Sauron's hand after defeating him in battle but was corrupted by its power.
